title: Just Like The Puppy Love
description: Love knows no boundaries.This book is definitely for you, if you share the feeling of love. The story is all about love and its complex relationships. There are no ready formulae to implement in love. It is the subject, best practiced by the one. It is interesting to follow when three unknown souls meet on the shore of Goa. Goa has seen all kind of love since its inception but this love story is different. It was a story the flowing waters of the Arabian Sea would tell to all the tourists who visit its shore. It is the story of a Puppy Love!!!“Let the Beauty goes to Peacock, Let the peace goes to Dove,Let the hearts unite forever, And let them begin a puppy love.”Turn the pages to enjoy the night of Goa...
author: Jaydeep Jesur
